Package pacman.hunter

Class Hunter

  • Object
    • Entity
      • Hunter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Moveable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Hungry, Phasey, Phil, Speedy
    public abstract class Hunter
extends Entity
    Hunters are entities which are controlled by the player to clear the board and win the game. Hunters in this version have special abilities like "phasing through ghost's" and "run's two blocks at a time" and so on. These special abilities are too add a bit of variety into the game.

    Note: during the first assignment the Hunter class has it's special abilities that have durations. In assignment two we will build upon the special ability and actually implement them. Currently in assignment 1 there is nothing that makes the duration of a special ability decrease ( this will be in Assignment 2 ).

    Implement this for Assignment 1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Hunter()
      Creates a Hunter setting the hunter to be alive with the following conditions: The hunter has not used it's special yet.
      Hunter​(Hunter original)
      Creates a Hunter where the following attributes are the same between this hunter and the original: Dead/Alive status Whether the hunter has used its special ability yet. The duration remaining of the special ability. The position and direction.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hunter

        public Hunter()
        Creates a Hunter setting the hunter to be alive with the following conditions: The hunter has not used it's special yet. The hunter also does not have its special active. This hunter has a position of (0, 0) with a direction of UP.
        Implement this for Assignment 1

      • Hunter

        public Hunter​(Hunter original)
        Creates a Hunter where the following attributes are the same between this hunter and the original:
        • Dead/Alive status
        • Whether the hunter has used its special ability yet.
        • The duration remaining of the special ability.
        • The position and direction.
        Parameters:
        original - hunter to copy.
        Implement this for Assignment 1

    • Method Detail

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        Tells if the hunter is dead.
        Returns:
        true if dead, false otherwise.
        Implement this for Assignment 1

      • activateSpecial

        public void activateSpecial​(int duration)
        Activates the hunter's special if the hunter hasn't already used its special before. If the hunter has already used its special then do not change the special duration. If the duration for the special is greater than zero then use the hunter's special and set the special's duration to the given duration. If the duration for the special is zero or lower than do not change the special duration and do not use up the hunter's special.
        Parameters:
        duration - to activate the special for.
        Implement this for Assignment 1

      • getSpecialDurationRemaining

        public int getSpecialDurationRemaining()
        Gets how many ticks of our special ability is remaining.
        Returns:
        the amount of ticks remaining for the special.
        Implement this for Assignment 1

      • isSpecialActive

        public boolean isSpecialActive()
        Checks if the special is currently active.
        Returns:
        true if the special ability has a duration remaining that is greater than 0 ticks.
        Implement this for Assignment 1

      • hit

        public void hit​(Ghost ghost)
         throws NullPointerException
        Checks to see if the hunter is at the same position of the ghost. If the ghost and hunter do have the same position then if the ghost is Phase.FRIGHTENED the ghost is killed Ghost.kill() otherwise the ghost kills the hunter. If the ghost and hunter are not at the same position then do nothing.
        Parameters:
        ghost - to check if were colliding with.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - is ghost is null.
        Implement this for Assignment 1

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets this hunter to be:
        • Alive
        • With a special that has not been used yet
        • A special that is not active ( duration of 0 )
        • With a Direction of Direction.UP
        • With a Position of ( 0, 0 )
        Implement this for Assignment 1
